task_summary: Detect the cloth, grasp a corner with a pinch, lift and move it, then place and press the corner onto the cloth to form a fold, release, and retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A PR2 end-effector manipulates a pink cloth on a wooden tabletop. The goal is to fold the cloth by pinching a corner, lifting slightly, translating to a fold location, and pressing the corner down before releasing. The sequence must be gentle to avoid slipping. Visual confirmation and alignment precede the grasp; thereafter, the robot lifts minimally, repositions, and places the corner with light contact. The scene features a single cloth and clear workspace; timing and tolerances are moderate.
preconditions: Cloth is on the table within reachable workspace
Camera view provides sufficient visibility of the cloth
Fold target pose is defined on the blackboard
stepwise_plan: Perceive the cloth and move above it.
Align precisely and open the gripper.
Compute a pinch grasp at a corner and pick.
Lift slightly and move to the fold preparation pose.
Place at the fold pose with a 90Â° yaw and light press.
success_criteria: Corner of cloth is placed onto the cloth body forming a visible fold
No slippage during or after release
Gripper ends clear of the workspace
failure_and_recovery: If detection fails: re-detect from a new vantage.
If grasp slips: reopen, realign with tighter tolerance, and retry pick.
If contact not detected during press: lower again within safe limits.
task_long_description.termination: Terminate after release and retreat once the fold is stable and no object remains in the gripper.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable pinch grasp on the cloth corner is apparent.
frame_3.predicts_next: suggests upcoming lift and translation before placing to fold.

node_specs.description: Detect the cloth in the workspace.
Move above the cloth with safe vertical offset.
Align precisely over the grasp point.
Compute pinch grasp at a cloth corner.
Small lift to clear table before transport.
Place corner at fold pose with orientation.
Gently press to set the fold.
Back away to clear the workspace.

failure_modes: Grasp slip due to low friction
recovery_strategy: Reposition to fold_pose and press again
assumptions: Folding is approximated by pick-and-place of a corner onto a predefined fold pose; frames show a pinch at a cloth corner and a subsequent placement/retreat.

expected_success_criteria: Corner lies atop cloth body with crease visible
No cloth in gripper after release
